test-set.name: houtil-to-first
test-set.description: Tests for the higher-order houtil:to-first function

test-case.name: houtil-to-first-001
test-case.description: Basic test using starts-with()

test-case.name: houtil-to-first-002
test-case.description: Test using an inline user-defined function

test-case.name: houtil-to-first-003
test-case.description: Test using an inline user-defined function
test-case.test: let $data := (/employees) return houtil:to-first($data/emp, function($x as element(emp)){xs:int($x/@salary) eq 250})

test-case.name: houtil-to-first-004
test-case.description: Test using an inline user-defined function
test-case.test: for $n in 1 to 9 return houtil:to-first(1 to 20, function($x){$x eq $n})

test-case.name: houtil-to-first-005
test-case.description: Condition not satisfied by any item in the sequence
test-case.test: let $data := (/employees) return houtil:to-first($data/emp, function($x as element(emp)){xs:int($x/@salary) eq 0})

test-case.name: houtil-to-first-006
test-case.description: Filter returns an untyped node that can be cast to boolean

test-case.name: houtil-to-first-901
test-case.description: "to-first" function - not a boolean

test-case.name: houtil-to-first-902
test-case.description: "to-first" function - returns empty sequence

test-case.name: houtil-to-first-903
test-case.description: "to-first" function - returns non-singleton sequence
test-case.test: houtil:to-first( ("apple", "pear", "apricot", "advocado", "orange"), function($x){if(starts-with($x,'a')) then (true(), true()) else false()})

test-case.name: houtil-to-first-904
test-case.description: "to-first" function - item in sequence is of wrong type

test-case.name: houtil-to-first-911
test-case.description: Attempts to evaluate the "to-first" function with no arguments.

test-case.name: houtil-to-first-912
test-case.description: Attempts to reference the "to-first" function with arity zero.

test-case.name: houtil-to-first-913
test-case.description: Attempts to evaluate the "to-first" function with one argument.

test-case.name: houtil-to-first-914
test-case.description: Attempts to reference the "to-first" function with arity one.

test-case.name: houtil-to-first-915
test-case.description: Attempts to reference the "to-first" function with arity two.

test-case.name: houtil-to-first-920
test-case.description: Tests the type checking of the $f argument.
test-case.test: houtil:to-first( 1, function($a as item()) as xs:boolean* { boolean($a), boolean($a) } )

test-case.name: houtil-to-first-921
test-case.description: Tests the type checking of the $f argument.
test-case.test: houtil:to-first( 1, function($a as item()) as xs:boolean? { () } )

test-case.name: houtil-to-first-922
test-case.description: Tests the type checking of the $f argument.

test-case.name: houtil-to-first-923
test-case.description: Evaluates the "to-first" function with $seq set to a mix of item types
test-case.test: houtil:to-first( (//emp, 1, "string", 3.14, 2.7e0, exists#1), function($arg) { $arg instance of function(*) } )

test-case.name: houtil-to-first-924
test-case.description: Evaluates the "to-first" function with $f set to a function which _could_ (but doesn't) return a non-boolean value
test-case.test: houtil:to-first( 1 to 10, function($arg) { if ($arg eq 100) then () else false()})

test-case.name: houtil-to-first-925
test-case.description: Evaluates the "to-first" function with $f set to a function which _could_ (and does) return a non-boolean value
test-case.test: houtil:to-first( 1 to 10, function($arg) { if ($arg eq 5) then () else false()})

test-case.name: houtil-to-first-933
test-case.description: Evaluates the "to-first" function with $f set to a function which expects integers, but is supplied with strings.
test-case.test: houtil:to-first( ("1", "2", "3"), function($arg as xs:integer) as xs:boolean { $arg eq 100 } )
